PREFIX.description: Prefix of drex ai Ex: . , / , # , & etc. Put any symbol

DEV.description: Put any phone numbers you want to be bot owner without + or spaces "," Ex: 254102074064, 254729553638

NOT_OWNER_MSG.description: Put a message that the bot will send if a parameter that requires only owner user is violated. Example: Owner only

BOT_ADMIN_MSG.description: Put a message that the bot will send if a parameter that requires bot to be admin is violated. Example: Bot is not admin!

ADMIN_MSG.description: Put a message that the bot will send if a parameter that requires only owner user is violated. Example: Only admins are allowed to use this command
ADMIN_MSG.value: ğ‘ğğ¥ğšğ± ğ²ğ¨ğ®ğ« ğ›ğšğ¥ğ¥ğ¬ ğ¤ğ¢ğ, ğšğğ¦ğ¢ğ§'ğ¬ ğœğ¨ğ¦ğ¦ğšğ§ğ ğ¨ğ§ğ¥ğ²!

BAD_WORD.description: List words separated with commas that will be considered as bad and will trigger bot to kick. Example: fuck, pussy, hoe
BAD_WORD.value: fuck, pussy, hoe, nigga, bitch, umbwa, mbwa, fala, mea, sikujali, skujali, kinuthia, dwanzi, kumamako, mzee, whore

BAD_WORD_KICK.description: Put here TRUE if you want the bot to automatically kick group members using words that you have listed as bad

GROUP_ONLY_MSG.description: Put a message that the bot will send if a parameter that works in group chats only is violated. Example: This command will work in groups only

AUTOREAD.description: Put here TRUE if you want bot to automatically bluetick messages in private chats

AUTOVIEW.description: Input true if you want bot to automatically read status update

WA_PRESENCE.description: Input either recording or typing. This enables bot to simulate typing or recording.

ANTILINK.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to kick link senders

ANTILINK_ALL.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to kick users sending any links.

ANTIBOT.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to kick other bots from group

WELCOME.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to send welcome message to new members.

ANTIFOREIGN.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to kick non-kenyan numbers joining.

AUTOBIO.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to autoupdate its about with current time and date.

APP_NAME.description: Input your app name that you put above.

GPT_INBOX.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to autoreply inbox messages using openai API.

MENU_TYPE.description: Input either VIDEO, LINK or IMAGE. This will allow bot to display different dynamic menu types

AI.description: Put your OpenAI API key here. This will allow AI features to work correctly. This key starts with sk-
